sentences.chinese: 項籍者，下相人也，字羽。
sentences.literal: Xiang Ji one, Xia Xiang person also, style Yu.

sentences.chinese: 初起時，年二十四。
sentences.literal: Initially rose time, age twenty-four.

sentences.chinese: 其季父項梁，梁父即楚將項燕，為秦將王翦所戮者也。
sentences.literal: His youngest uncle Xiang Liang, Liang father namely Chu general Xiang Yan, was Qin general Wang Jian what beheaded ones also.

sentences.chinese: 項氏世世為楚將，封於項，故姓項氏。
sentences.literal: Xiang clan generation generation was Chu generals, enfeoffed at Xiang, therefore surname Xiang clan.

sentences.chinese: 項籍少時，學書不成，去學劍，又不成。
sentences.literal: Xiang Ji young time, studied writing not succeed, left studied sword, again not succeed.

sentences.chinese: 項梁怒之。
sentences.literal: Xiang Liang angered him.

sentences.chinese: 籍曰：「書足以記名姓而已。
sentences.literal: Ji said: 'Writing sufficient record names surnames only.

sentences.chinese: 劍一人敵，不足學，學萬人敵。」
sentences.literal: Sword one person enemy, not sufficient learn, learn ten thousand people enemy.'

sentences.chinese: 於是項梁乃教籍兵法，籍大喜，略知其意，又不肯竟學。
sentences.literal: Thereupon Xiang Liang then taught Ji military methods, Ji greatly happy, roughly knew its meaning, moreover not willing completely learn.

sentences.chinese: 項梁嘗有櫟陽逮，乃請蘄獄掾曹咎書抵櫟陽獄掾司馬欣，以故事得已。
sentences.literal: Xiang Liang once had Que Yang arrest, then requested Qi prison clerk Cao Jiu write reached Que Yang prison clerk Sima Xin, with former matters obtained end.

sentences.chinese: 項梁殺人，與籍避仇於吳中。
sentences.literal: Xiang Liang killed person, with Ji avoided enemies at Wu Zhong.

sentences.chinese: 吳中賢士大夫皆出項梁下。
sentences.literal: Wu Zhong worthy scholars grand masters all came out Xiang Liang below.

sentences.chinese: 每吳中有大繇役及喪，項梁常為主辦，陰以兵法部勒賓客及子弟，以是知其能。
sentences.literal: Every Wu Zhong had great labor service and mourning, Xiang Liang constantly was main manager, secretly with military methods organized guests and younger brothers, with this knew his ability.

sentences.chinese: 秦始皇帝游會稽，渡浙江，梁與籍俱觀。
sentences.literal: Qin Beginning Emperor toured Kui Ji, crossed Zhe Jiang, Liang with Ji together observed.

sentences.chinese: 籍曰：「彼可取而代也。」
sentences.literal: Ji said: 'That can take and replace also.'

sentences.chinese: 梁掩其口，曰：「毋妄言，族矣！」
sentences.literal: Liang covered his mouth, said: 'Not reckless speak, clan perished!'

sentences.chinese: 梁以此奇籍。
sentences.literal: Liang with this considered Ji extraordinary.

sentences.chinese: 籍長八尺餘，力能扛鼎，才氣過人，雖吳中子弟皆已憚籍矣。
sentences.literal: Ji tall eight chi remainder, strength could lift tripod, talent spirit surpassed people, though Wu Zhong younger brothers all already feared Ji already.

sentences.chinese: 秦二世元年七月，陳涉等起大澤中。
sentences.literal: Qin Second Generation first year seventh month, Chen She etc. rose great marsh middle.

sentences.chinese: 其九月，會稽守通謂梁曰：「江西皆反，此亦天亡秦之時也。
sentences.literal: Its ninth month, Kui Ji governor Tong said to Liang: 'Jiang west all rebelled, this also heaven perished Qin time also.

sentences.chinese: 吾聞先即制人，後則為人所制。
sentences.literal: I heard first then control people, later then by people controlled.

sentences.chinese: 吾欲發兵，使公及桓楚將。」
sentences.literal: I wish dispatch troops, make duke and Huan Chu general.'

sentences.chinese: 是時桓楚亡在澤中。
sentences.literal: This time Huan Chu fled in marsh middle.

sentences.chinese: 梁曰：「桓楚亡，人莫知其處，獨籍知之耳。」
sentences.literal: Liang said: 'Huan Chu fled, people none know his place, only Ji knows it ear.'

sentences.chinese: 梁乃出，誡籍持劍居外待。
sentences.literal: Liang then went out, warned Ji hold sword dwell outside wait.

sentences.chinese: 梁復入，與守坐，曰：「請召籍，使受命召桓楚。」
sentences.literal: Liang again entered, with governor sat, said: 'Please summon Ji, make receive command summon Huan Chu.'

sentences.chinese: 守曰：「諾。」
sentences.literal: Governor said: 'Agreed.'

sentences.chinese: 梁召籍入。
sentences.literal: Liang summoned Ji enter.

sentences.chinese: 須臾，梁眴籍曰：「可行矣！」
sentences.literal: Moment, Liang winked Ji said: 'Can act already!'

sentences.chinese: 於是籍遂拔劍斬守頭。
sentences.literal: Thereupon Ji then drew sword beheaded governor head.

sentences.chinese: 項梁持守頭，佩其印綬。
sentences.literal: Xiang Liang held governor head, wore his seal ribbons.

sentences.chinese: 門下大驚，擾亂，籍所擊殺數十百人。
sentences.literal: Gate below greatly startled, disturbed chaotic, Ji what struck killed several ten hundred people.

sentences.chinese: 一府中皆慴伏，莫敢起。
sentences.literal: One office middle all terrified submitted, none dared rise.

sentences.chinese: 梁乃召故所知豪吏，諭以所為起大事，遂舉吳中兵。
sentences.literal: Liang then summoned formerly known heroic officials, explained with what did raise great matters, then raised Wu Zhong troops.

sentences.chinese: 使人收下縣，得精兵八千人。
sentences.literal: Made people collect lower counties, obtained elite troops eight thousand people.

sentences.chinese: 梁部署吳中豪傑為校尉、候、司馬。
sentences.literal: Liang deployed Wu Zhong heroic outstanding as company commanders, scouts, adjutants.

sentences.chinese: 有一人不得用，自言於梁。
sentences.literal: Had one person not obtained use, self spoke to Liang.

sentences.chinese: 梁曰：「前時某喪使公主某事，不能辦，以此不任用公。」
sentences.literal: Liang said: 'Former time certain mourning made you duke certain matters, could not manage, with this not employed you.'

sentences.chinese: 眾乃皆伏。
sentences.literal: Crowd then all submitted.

sentences.chinese: 於是梁為會稽守，籍為裨將，徇下縣。
sentences.literal: Thereupon Liang was Kui Ji governor, Ji was assistant general, toured lower counties.

sentences.chinese: 廣陵人召平於是為陳王徇廣陵，未能下。
sentences.literal: Guang Ling person Zhao Ping at this for Chen king toured Guang Ling, not yet able submit.

sentences.chinese: 聞陳王敗走，秦兵又且至，乃渡江矯陳王命，拜梁為楚王上柱國。
sentences.literal: Heard Chen king defeated fled, Qin troops moreover about arrived, then crossed Jiang forged Chen king command, appointed Liang as Chu king supreme pillar state.

sentences.chinese: 曰：「江東已定，急引兵西擊秦。」
sentences.literal: Said: 'Jiang east already settled, urgently lead troops west strike Qin.'

sentences.chinese: 項梁乃以八千人渡江而西。
sentences.literal: Xiang Liang then with eight thousand people crossed Jiang west.

sentences.chinese: 聞陳嬰已下東陽，使使欲與連和俱西。
sentences.literal: Heard Chen Ying already submitted Dong Yang, made envoy wished with connect harmony together west.

sentences.chinese: 陳嬰者，故東陽令史，居縣中，素信謹，稱為長者。
sentences.literal: Chen Ying one, former Dong Yang magistrate secretary, resided county middle, originally trustworthy careful, called elder.

sentences.chinese: 東陽少年殺其令，相聚數千人，欲置長，無適用，乃請陳嬰。
sentences.literal: Dong Yang youths killed their magistrate, mutually gathered several thousand people, wished establish leader, none suitable applied, then requested Chen Ying.

sentences.chinese: 嬰謝不能，遂彊立嬰為長，縣中從者得二萬人。
sentences.literal: Ying declined could not, then strongly established Ying as leader, county middle followers obtained twenty thousand people.

sentences.chinese: 少年欲立嬰便為王，異軍蒼頭特起。
sentences.literal: Youths wished establish Ying then as king, different army dark heads specially rose.

sentences.chinese: 陳嬰母謂嬰曰：「自我為汝家婦，未嘗聞汝先古之有貴者。
sentences.literal: Chen Ying mother said to Ying: 'From I became your family woman, never heard your ancestors had noble ones.
